column2: USA Truck, Inc. engages in the provision of transportation of general commodities. The company is headquartered in Van Buren, Arkansas and currently employs 2,500 full-time employees. The firm operates through two segments: Trucking and Strategic Capacity Solutions (SCS). The Trucking segment consists of truckload and dedicated freight services. The SCS segment consists of freight brokerage and rail intermodal services. The firm transports full dry van trailer loads of freight from origin to destination without intermediate stops or handling. The firm offers a range of truckload and logistics services to a customer base that spans a range of industries. The firm's fleet of approximately 1,832 tractors consists of 1,568 company tractors and 264 independent contractor tractors. The firm owns approximately 6,200 trailers. The firm also transports general commodities into and out of Mexico by allowing through-trailer service from its terminal in Laredo, Texas.
